member.name: ParentChildRelation
member.summary: Associates a parent object with a child object.

member.name: ParentChildRelation.Parent
member.summary: A handle to the parent object.

member.name: ParentChildRelation.Child
member.summary: A handle to the child object.

member.name: ParentChildRelation.ChildIndex
member.summary: The index of Child in the Children collection of Parent.
